I want you to build a complete Point of Sale (POS) application called "ALKD-POS".

📱 Platforms:
- Android (APK ready to install)
- Progressive Web App (PWA) for desktop and mobile browser
- Responsive UI that adapts to all screen sizes

🎨 Design:
- Professional, elegant, and modern
- Color theme: Yellow (primary), Black & White (secondary)
- Dark/Light mode switch
- Clean dashboard with quick actions and real-time statistics

🔑 Features:
1. Authentication System
   - Admin can create an account
   - Employees can log in with username & password
   - Role-based access control (Admin / Employee)

2. Dashboard
   - Real-time sales statistics
   - Quick actions (New Sale, Add Product, Reports)
   - Total revenue, daily sales, best products

3. POS Checkout System
   - Add products to cart by search or barcode scanner
   - Select quantity and apply discounts
   - Multiple payment methods: Cash, Mobile Money, Credit
   - If payment is by credit: status = "À crédit / dette" (not "Paid")
   - Generate professional and elegant receipt

4. Product Management
   - Add, edit, delete products
   - Categories and stock management
   - Barcode support for products

5. Customer Management
   - Save customer information (name, phone, address)
   - Manage credit balance for each customer
   - Track outstanding payments and debts

6. Reports & Analytics
   - Daily / weekly / monthly reports
   - Revenue insights and sales trends
   - Export reports as PDF or Excel

7. Receipt System
   - Print or share receipts via Bluetooth printer or PDF
   - Option to share receipt by text or PDF
   - Receipt must be elegant, clear, and professional
   - If PDF, all information must fit in the page (no overflow)

8. Settings
   - Company information (logo, address, phone)
   - Currency options: XOF/FCFA, USD, EUR
   - Language options: French / English (applied globally in the app)

9. Licensing System
   - Admin can activate licenses for clients
   - License types: monthly, quarterly, yearly, lifetime

⚙ Technical Requirements:
- Backend-as-a-Service (database for products, customers, sales)
- Support offline mode (data cached and synced when online)
- CI/CD for automatic builds
- Store-ready (Google Play upload possible)
